Statute.Title: Canada — Korea Economic Growth and Prosperity Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Croissance économique et la prospérité — Canada-Corée, Loi sur la)

CoordinatingAmendment.Text: Coordinating amendments, 2014, c. 28, ss. 59 (will never apply) and 60

Transitional.Text: Transitionals, 2017, c. 6, s. 132 (list of geographical indications)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2014, c. 28, ss. 59 and 60 in force on assent 26.11.2014; ss. 2 to 22 in force on 01.01.2015 see s. 61.
